game.ai.shared.factory.specification

Class AbstractGameFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ai.shared.factory.specification.AbstractGameFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Connect4GameFactory, TictactoeGameFactory

    public abstract class AbstractGameFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameFactory
    This is an abstract class that extends from IGameFactory
    This class will implement some common methods shared among specific games
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem
